DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to maintain a prospective biobank of human samples obtained from donors and recipients of renal allografts, including biopsy tissue, peripheral blood samples and urine samples.
DOC.brief_title: BIOBANK Renal Transplantation University Hospitals Leuven
DOC.detailed_description: Clinical data and bio-specimens are prospectively collected and stored for undefined future translational research projects.
